text:
Water has been released on Wednesday for irrigation from Kuppanatham reservoir built in Chengam taluk across River Cheyyar.

District Collector A. Gnanasekaran opened the sluice gates. There was 695 million cubic feet water in the dam.

240 cubic feet per second of water would be released for the next 16 days and 235 cusecs would be released for another 9 days.
title: Water released
